name: Big Cat Fetch
description:
Big Cat Fetch is for 1-2 players.

Keyboard and Gamepad controller supported.

PersonKeyboard
Walk: W, A, S, D
Toss: Spacebar
Gamepad (DualShock)
Walk: D-pad or Left Analog Stick
Toss: L1CatKeyboard
Run: Arrow keysGamepad (DualShock)
Run: Right Analog Stick

Official submission for #GoGodotJam
